The :mod:`~condconfigparser.parser` submodule
---------------------------------------------

.. warning::

  The functions and methods listed in this section are implementation details
  of CondConfigParser. **Do not use them in your programs** if you rely on API
  stability, as they are likely to change in incompatible ways without prior
  notice.

   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
   :synopsis: Parser module for CondConfigParser
